## onPixelRatioChanged() function

Create a listener that will fire a callback whenever the pixel ratio of the current window changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function onPixelRatioChanged(callback: (pixelRatio: number) => void, options?: OnPixelRatioChangedOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

callback


</td><td>

(pixelRatio: number) =&gt; void


</td><td>

The function called when the pixel ratio changes.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[OnPixelRatioChangedOptions](./spank-my-dom.onpixelratiochangedoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional configuration object.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
onPixelRatioChanged((pixelRatio) => {
    console.log(pixelRatio);
});
```
